name: speed limit
lyrics:
作词 : Gareth.T/Jacob Strom
作曲 : Gareth.T/Jacob Strom
编曲 : Gareth.T/Teddy Fan

I shouldn’t be as sad as I am
我怎么会如此悲伤呢
But it’s out my hands
这本就不是我能控制的
Tryna change up who I am
我想找回我的初心
But I don’t know if I can, but I don’t know if I can,
但我已经深陷其中
They say you good
他们说
Where you at
你已经很棒了
You got time on your hands
来日方长
But waiting was never the plan
但我怎能虚度光阴
So I brought some new clothes
于是我换了身行头
Got a new name
换了新的名字
To prove I’m in a new lane
踏上又一段旅途
Oh





I’m going 0 to 100
时速从0到100
Speed ain't never killed nobody like me
感觉不到身边的一切正在逝去
I’m chasing money, fame and pussy
追逐名利与虚荣
Like its all I know ya
就像我的座右铭
Doing high speeds
速度至上
I need to go slow
也许是该慢下来了




Wrote too much
写了很多
Songs about love
爱的赞歌
When I still ain’t found it
但我从未被爱
Wrote too much
又写了很多歌
Songs for my mom
给我母亲
But she don’t see my vision
却从未得到理解
Tells me school’s the safest
她说:鸟欲高飞先振翅
If you wanna be famous
人求上进先读书
You gotta learn patience
不鸣则已
And be complacent
一鸣惊人
I just want more money in the bank
我只想不再为生计烦恼
To compensate the time I spent
只希望能劳有所得
I see my name in those lights
万家灯火中有栖身之处
When I'm at my darkest
给予我一丝温暖




I’m going 0 to 100
时速从0到100
Speed ain't never killed nobody like me
已经和当初判若两人
I’m chasing money, fame and pussy
追逐名利与虚荣
Like its all I know ya
就像我的座右铭
Doing high speeds
速度至上
I need to go slow
是该慢下来了
I’m going 0 to 100
我在零百加速中
Speed ain't never killed nobody like me
速度会麻痹我的悲伤
I’m chasing money, fame and pussy
追逐名利和虚荣
Like its all I know ya
我的座右铭
Doing high speeds
速度至上
I need to go slow
也许是该慢下来了
木吉他 : Teddy Fan
收起
